Description: Clear Channel Outdoor agreed to pay $30,000 in fines for failing to properly disclose its role in providing billboards touting candidates.
Info Source: Billboard Firm to Be Fined for Political Effort; Clear Channel Outdoor agrees to pay $30,000 for not disclosing that it independently backed Rocky Delgadillo and other L.A. candidates, Los Angeles Times, October 6, 2005 (via Nexis).
